channel.title: Port Forwarding Help
channel.description:
I have been dealing with this problem for a yaer and a half. I can't port forward at all. I followed the guides on portforward.com and still nothing. I set up my no-ip and still nothing. I changed the firewall to allow the post and still nothing. What do you guys suggest?
~XdeathXmageX

item.title: Port Forwarding Help
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

Okay, thanks. Sorry. I’ve read the rules and didn’t consider this a computer related problem, as it has to do with my server.

~XdeathXmageX

Read full topic

item.title: Port Forwarding Help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

as the soul said, we dont deal with computer problems, even though there is lots of tuts on how to portfoward or use utorrent which is very easy.

GET SEARCHING.

Read full topic
